did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell artists and local video programs.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: A 3/4" video-cassette of the work of Cornell University artists. Included on the tape are Archie R. Ammons, John A. Hartell, Peter H. Kahn, Stephen F. Poleskie, and Jason L. Seley; interviews by Johnnie Parrish.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: A 3/4" video-cassette of the work of Cornell University artists. Included on the tape are Archie R. Ammons, John A. Hartell, Peter H. Kahn, Stephen F. Poleskie, and Jason L. Seley; interviews by Johnnie Parrish.
Also, videotapes from "Focus on Art" with area artists, and numerous other programs featuring local issues, individuals, and concerns.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell artists and local video programs. #3867. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
